page.title: 05LIGHTHOUSE KEEPER ON SCORAIG
page.content: THE LIGHTHOUSE IS ON CAILLEACH HEAD, A VERY ROCKY POINT AT THE TIP OF SCORAIG PENINSULA. IT FLASHES TWICE EVERY 12sec. SO THAT THE BOATS DO NOT CRASH INTO THE ROCKS.THE LIGHTOUSE KEEPER LIVES AT SCORAIG,3km.T0 THE EAST.HE PAINTS IT WHITE EVERY FEW YEARS.IT HAS ALWAYS BEEN WHITE,SO IT CAN BE SEEN EASILY.IT USES 5 CYLINDERS OF ACETYLENE GAS A YEAR TO KEEP THE LIGHT BURNING.THE LIGHTHOUSE HELICOPTER LANDS AT THE LIGHTHOUSE BRINGING THE NEW CYLINDERS IN AND TAKES THE OLD ONES BACK.THE KEEPER GOES UP TO THE LIGHTHOUSE ONCE A WEEK TO CHECK THE PRESSURE AND DO ROUTINE MAINTAINANCE.HE HAS TO WRITE A REPORT TO THE NORTHERN LIGHTHOUSE BOARD ONCE A WEEK.
